Title: Comrade Bethune's unselfish spirit, expresses his extreme feeling of responsibility towards his work and his extreme warmheartedness towards comrades and the people. Every Communist Party member must learn from him
Publisher: Shanghai Renmin Jiaoyu chubanshe (上海人民教育出版社)
Notes: The text is a quotation from Mao Zedong's In Memory of Norman Bethune, first published on 21 December, 1939.
